rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a large archway leading into the living area. The design uses traditional Chettinad motifs and stone finishes.
Open-plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Large windows on the east and south facades ensure natural light; interior design incorporates Chettinad patterns.
Modern open-plan kitchen connected to the living area. Features ample storage and a ventilation system that complies with local building norms.
Dedicated home theater space in the ground floor. Soundproofing and ambient lighting integrated to create an immersive experience.
Cozy guest bedroom featuring a private ensuite bathroom adjoining it for convenience. Uses traditional Chettinad elements in decor and natural materials.

openings.description: Large entrance door facing north to adhere to Vastu principles for prosperity. Reinforced wood with carved motifs.
Balcony on the south side overlooking the garden, providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Semi-open passage connecting the living area to the expansive garden for an integrated outdoor living experience.
